Hero.subtitle: CORENTIN M.
Hero.title:
Full Stack
Developer
Hero.description: Specialized in web and system development. I design high-performance and robust solutions, from kernel to cloud.

About.title: About Me
About.description1: Full Stack Software Engineer and former student at 42 School, I design high-performance systems and complete web solutions.
About.description2: My expertise ranges from low-level system programming (C, C++, Unix, Bash) to modern web architectures (Python, Django, Docker). I place a high importance on code quality, performance, and deployment automation.

Timeline.title: My Journey
Timeline.subtitle: From intensive training to professional practice.
Timeline.bts_desc: Higher Technician Certificate in Digital Systems - Computing and Networks Option. Network architecture, system, and embedded programming.
Timeline.piscine_desc: Intensive 4-week selection. Introduction to C, Shell, and fundamental programming concepts.
Timeline.school_desc: Intensive learning of C/C++ and system architecture. Realization of complex projects: Minishell (Bash), Cub3D (Graphics engine), Philosophers (Concurrency).
Timeline.arcom_desc: Development and maintenance of a complete After-Sales Service management solution. Optimization of logistic flows, process automation, and creation of intuitive administrative interfaces.

Projects.title: Recent Projects
Projects.subtitle: A selection of my most ambitious works, combining technique and aesthetics.
Projects.arcom_desc: Development and maintenance for 2 years of a complete After-Sales Service management solution. Optimization of logistic flows and administrative interface.
Projects.minishell_desc: Faithful reimplementation of a Unix Shell (Bash). Advanced process management, redirections, pipes, and signals.
Projects.cub3d_desc: 3D rendering engine style Wolfenstein 3D created from scratch in C. Physics management, textures, and raycasting.
Projects.philosophers_desc: Simulation of the dining philosophers problem. Complex management of concurrency, threads, mutexes, and deadlock prevention.

Contact.title: Let's Work Together
Contact.description: Have a project in mind? I am always open to new collaboration opportunities.
Contact.success_msg: Thank you for contacting me. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
